message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $160. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice,  $160 is a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay $110. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product is worth significantly more to me. Could you consider $140?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down, but $140 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go to $120.  If that's not acceptable, I'm going to have to look at other options.
